solutions.title: MC20 Application Solution
solutions.subtitle: Professional Audio Pickup Solution
solutions.description: MC20 utilizes multi-microphone arrays and beamforming technology for exceptionally clear and natural voice pickup with excellent noise reduction. Effective in glass rooms and high-ceiling spaces.
solutions.fullDescription: The MC20 series array microphone adopts advanced multi-microphone array design and beamforming technology, delivering clear and natural voice pickup in various complex acoustic environments. Whether in glass-walled conference rooms or high-ceiling conference halls, MC20 effectively eliminates environmental noise and reverberation, ensuring every participant's voice is clearly captured and transmitted.

advantages.description: Omnidirectional voice capture with no dead zones

advantages.title: Beamforming Technology
advantages.description: Precise target voice localization and pickup

advantages.title: Complex Environment Adaptation
advantages.description: Outstanding performance in glass rooms and high-ceiling spaces

solutions.title: Array Microphone MC20 Solution
solutions.subtitle: Advanced Audio Pickup Technology Solution
solutions.description: Advanced audio pickup technology suitable for various meeting and teaching scenarios, featuring multi-microphone array design, beamforming technology and intelligent audio processing.
solutions.fullDescription: The MC20 array microphone solution is designed for modern meeting and teaching environments, integrating multiple advanced audio technologies. Multi-microphone array design enables omnidirectional sound capture, beamforming technology ensures precise pickup of target speakers, and intelligent audio processing automatically optimizes audio quality to adapt to challenging acoustic environments.

advantages.title: Challenging Environment Adaptation
advantages.description: Effective handling of complex acoustic conditions
